title: Bernie Sanders Campaign Senior Advisor Jeff Weaver
itunes:title: Bernie Sanders Campaign Senior Advisor Jeff Weaver
description:
Jeff Weaver, Senior Advisor for the Bernie Sanders presidential campaign discusses Senator Bernie Sanders policies including: Medicare for All, the economy, trade, the future of the Democratic party, college tuition and the Green New Deal. He speaks to Bloomberg’s Kevin Cirilli, Chief Washington Correspondent for Bloomberg Television and Radio.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
